name: MAZEGAME (Housayn Raffea)
description:
MAZEGAME - A very short game made in a week, using the Godot game engine.

It's as simple as getting to the exit in the shortest amount of time possible, while avoiding an enemy that's constantly chasing you. My best record is 32.854 seconds, see if you can beat it! 

Controls:

W, A, S, D - movement

Left mouse button - shoot

Right mouse button - turn on/off flashlight

Tips:

 - There is an arrow above your head that points to the exit. When you don't know where you are, take a quick look up to find your way to the exit. Be aware that you have to turn on your flashlight to see it. (I haven't found a way to include it as a part of the UI, so you're gonna have to deal with it for now.)

- The enemy cannot be killed, only pushed back. Shoot it to push it back.
